overview.heading: Overview
overview.text: I'm an undergraduate Computer Science & Engineering student at American International University in Bangladesh. I'm a quick learner with a strong interest in web development, driven to solve complex problems and develop innovative solutions that make a difference. I enjoy the fast-paced nature of web development as a frontend developer and adapt to emerging trends and industry best practices to produce appealing digital products that leave a lasting impact on users.

overview_features.title: Hey there, I'm Tahsin
overview_features.text: I'm a 24 year old software developer who has a strong passion for web development
